bmiInterpretation.title: Body Mass Index
bmiInterpretation.description: BMI (Body Mass Index) is a measure used to assess body weight in relation to height. It is a useful indicator for evaluating body fat and health risk categories.

idealWeight.title: Ideal Weight
idealWeight.description: Ideal weight is an estimate of a healthy body weight for a given height, gender, age, and body type.

heavy.label: Heavy/Very heavy
heavy.description: Very intense exercise/sports and/or heavy physical work

basalMetabolism.title: Basal Metabolic Rate
basalMetabolism.description: Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) is the number of calories your body needs to maintain basic physiological functions at rest.

caloricRequirements.title: Daily Caloric Requirements
caloricRequirements.description: Daily Caloric Requirements (DRC) represent the range of calories you need to consume each day to maintain your current weight based on your activity level.
